purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the information needed to describe the geometric properties of material as constrained by a shape. The shape information included is parametric, and path based, rather than an explicit closed curve model. The parameters are consistent among all segments in the path. The representation is harmonized with other industry standard representations of geometric curves used in CAD systems.

inscope.li: items within the scope of Basic_curve_arm;
items within the scope of Value_with_unit_extension_arm.

outscope.li: Multiple segments with different properties for each segment combined into one shape
